verses.verse: And the rulers <S%H8269><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> at Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>: the rest <S%H7605><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> also cast <S%H5307><s%> lots <S%H1486><s%>, to bring <S%H935><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of ten <S%H6235><s%> to dwell <S%H3427><s%> in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> city <S%H5892><s%>, and nine <S%H8672><s%> parts <S%H3027><s%> to dwell in other cities <S%H5892><s%>.
And the people <S%H5971><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> all the men <S%H582><s%>, that willingly offered <S%H5068><s%> themselves to dwell <S%H3427><s%> at Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.

Now these are the chief <S%H7218><s%> of the province <S%H4082><s%> that dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>: but in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> in his possession <S%H272><s%> in their cities <S%H5892><s%>, to wit <S%H3478><s%>, Israel, the priests <S%H3548><s%>, and the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, and the Nethinims <S%H5411><s%>, and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Solomon <S%H8010><s%>'s servants <S%H5650><s%>.

And at Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> certain of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>. Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>; Athaiah <S%H6265><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Uzziah <S%H5818><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zechariah <S%H2148><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Amariah <S%H568><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shephatiah <S%H8203><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Mahalaleel <S%H4111><s%>, of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Perez <S%H6557><s%>;

And Maaseiah <S%H4641><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Baruch <S%H1263><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Col <S%H3626><s%>–hozeh, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hazaiah <S%H2382><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Adaiah <S%H5718><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joiarib <S%H3114><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zechariah <S%H2148><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shiloni <S%H8023><s%>.

All the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Perez <S%H6557><s%> that dwelt <S%H3427><s%> at Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> were four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> threescore <S%H8346><s%> and eight <S%H8083><s%> valiant <S%H2428><s%> men <S%H582><s%>.

And these are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>; Sallu <S%H5543><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Meshullam <S%H4918><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joed <S%H3133><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Pedaiah <S%H6305><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kolaiah <S%H6964><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Maaseiah <S%H4641><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ithiel <S%H384><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jesaiah <S%H3470><s%>.
And after <S%H310><s%> him Gabbai <S%H1373><s%>, Sallai <S%H5543><s%>, nine <S%H8672><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> and eight <S%H8083><s%>.

And Joel <S%H3100><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zichri <S%H2147><s%> was their overseer <S%H6496><s%>: and Judah <S%H3063><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Senuah <S%H5574><s%> was second <S%H4932><s%> over the city <S%H5892><s%>.
Of the priests <S%H3548><s%>: Jedaiah <S%H3048><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joiarib <S%H3114><s%>, Jachin <S%H3199><s%>.

Seraiah <S%H8304><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hilkiah <S%H2518><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Meshullam <S%H4918><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zadok <S%H6659><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Meraioth <S%H4812><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahitub <S%H285><s%>, was the ruler <S%H5057><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>.

And their brethren <S%H251><s%> that did <S%H6213><s%> the work <S%H4399><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> were eight <S%H8083><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%>: and Adaiah <S%H5718><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jeroham <S%H3395><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Pelaliah <S%H6421><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Amzi <S%H557><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zechariah <S%H2148><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Pashur <S%H6583><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Malchiah <S%H4441><s%>,

And his brethren <S%H251><s%>, chief <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%>, two <S%H8147><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%>: and Amashai <S%H6023><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Azareel <S%H5832><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahasai <S%H273><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Meshillemoth <S%H4919><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Immer <S%H564><s%>,

And their brethren <S%H251><s%>, mighty men <S%H1368><s%> of valour <S%H2428><s%>, an hundred <S%H3967><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> and eight <S%H8083><s%>: and their overseer <S%H6496><s%> was Zabdiel <S%H2068><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of one of the great men <S%H1419><s%>.

Also of the Levites <S%H3881><s%>: Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hashub <S%H2815><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Azrikam <S%H5840><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hashabiah <S%H2811><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Bunni <S%H1138><s%>;

And Shabbethai <S%H7678><s%> and Jozabad <S%H3107><s%>, of the chief <S%H7218><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, had the oversight of the outward <S%H2435><s%> business <S%H4399><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>.

And Mattaniah <S%H4983><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Micha <S%H4316><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zabdi <S%H2067><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Asaph <S%H623><s%>, was the principal <S%H7218><s%> to begin <S%H8462><s%> the thanksgiving <S%H3034><s%> in prayer <S%H8605><s%>: and Bakbukiah <S%H1229><s%> the second <S%H4932><s%> among his brethren <S%H251><s%>, and Abda <S%H5653><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shammua <S%H8051><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Galal <S%H1559><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jeduthun <S%H3038><s%>.
All the Levites <S%H3881><s%> in the holy <S%H6944><s%> city <S%H5892><s%> were two hundred <S%H3967><s%> fourscore <S%H8084><s%> and four <S%H702><s%>.

Moreover the porters <S%H7778><s%>, Akkub <S%H6126><s%>, Talmon <S%H2929><s%>, and their brethren <S%H251><s%> that kept <S%H8104><s%> the gates <S%H8179><s%>, were an hundred <S%H3967><s%> seventy <S%H7657><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%>.

And the residue <S%H7605><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, of the priests <S%H3548><s%>, and the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, were in all the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, every one <S%H376><s%> in his inheritance <S%H5159><s%>.
But the Nethinims <S%H5411><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in Ophel <S%H6077><s%>: and Ziha <S%H6727><s%> and Gispa <S%H1658><s%> were over the Nethinims <S%H5411><s%>.

The overseer <S%H6496><s%> also of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> at Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> was Uzzi <S%H5813><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Bani <S%H1137><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hashabiah <S%H2811><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Mattaniah <S%H4983><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Micha <S%H4316><s%>. Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Asaph <S%H623><s%>, the singers <S%H7891><s%> were over <S%H5048><s%> the business <S%H4399><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>.

For it was the king <S%H4428><s%>'s commandment <S%H4687><s%> concerning them <S%H548><s%>, that a certain portion should be for the singers <S%H7891><s%>, due <S%H1697><s%> for every day <S%H3117><s%>.

And Pethahiah <S%H6611><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Meshezabeel <S%H4898><s%>, of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Zerah <S%H2226><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, was at the king <S%H4428><s%>'s hand <S%H3027><s%> in all matters <S%H1697><s%> concerning the people <S%H5971><s%>.

And for the villages <S%H2691><s%>, with their fields <S%H7704><s%>, some of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> at Kirjath <S%H7153><s%>–arba, and in the villages <S%H2691><s%> thereof <S%H1769><s%>, and at Dibon, and in the villages <S%H1323><s%> thereof <S%H3343><s%>, and at Jekabzeel, and in the villages thereof <S%H1323><s%>,
And at Jeshua <S%H3442><s%>, and at Moladah <S%H4137><s%>, and at Beth <S%H1046><s%>–phelet,
And at Hazar <S%H2705><s%>–shual, and at Beer <S%H884><s%>–sheba, and in the villages thereof <S%H1323><s%>,
And at Ziklag <S%H6860><s%>, and at Mekonah <S%H4368><s%>, and in the villages thereof <S%H1323><s%>,
And at En <S%H5884><s%>–rimmon, and at Zareah <S%H6881><s%>, and at Jarmuth <S%H3412><s%>,

Zanoah <S%H2182><s%>, Adullam <S%H5725><s%>, and in their villages <S%H2691><s%>, at Lachish <S%H3923><s%>, and the fields <S%H7704><s%> thereof <S%H5825><s%>, at Azekah, and in the villages <S%H1323><s%> thereof <S%H2583><s%>. And they dwelt from Beer <S%H884><s%>–sheba unto the valley <S%H1516><s%> of Hinnom <S%H2011><s%>.

The children <S%H1121><s%> also of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> from Geba <S%H1387><s%> dwelt at Michmash <S%H4363><s%>, and Aija <S%H5857><s%>, and Beth <S%H1008><s%>–el, and in their villages <S%H1323><s%>,
And at Anathoth <S%H6068><s%>, Nob <S%H5011><s%>, Ananiah <S%H6055><s%>,
Hazor <S%H2674><s%>, Ramah <S%H7414><s%>, Gittaim <S%H1664><s%>,
Hadid <S%H2307><s%>, Zeboim <S%H6650><s%>, Neballat <S%H5041><s%>,
Lod <S%H3850><s%>, and Ono <S%H207><s%>, the valley <S%H1516><s%> of craftsmen <S%H2791><s%>.
And of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> were divisions <S%H4256><s%> in Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and in Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>.
